lead_paragraph: The Indiana Supreme Court has declined to hear a lawsuit accusing Indiana University of violating the state’s open meetings law in the days leading up to the firing of Coach Bob Knight. That killed the suit filed by 46 fans six years ago, with the university’s actions being upheld.
